info.title: Replacing an existing &sbd; device with a new device

abstract.para: If you need to replace an &sbd; device, you can use crm sbd device add to add the new device and crm sbd device remove to remove the old device. If the cluster has two &sbd; devices, you can run these commands in any order. However, if the cluster has one or three &sbd; devices, you must run these commands in a specific order:

listitem.para: One device: crm sbd device remove cannot remove the only device, so you must add the new device before you can remove the old device.
Three devices: crm sbd device add cannot add a fourth device, so you must remove the old device before you can add the new device.
